body.p: Well, I have some small, minor items of little interest (ahem).

ol.li: Linuxworld Expo There will be a number of the developers attending the Linux Expo in San Francisco, rumour has it there will even be a Gentoo stand! (Checkout the PenguinPPC stand: Ed.)
Gcc 3.1 We're currently in the final testing stages towards launching a release enabling a full installation with gcc3.1 as the default compiler
New Install Guide for SPARCThe SPARC port maintainers have been hard at work and have produced this comprehensive guide to getting started with Gentoo Linux on both 32 and 64 bit SPARC hardware.
QliLinux.comAre now selling Gentoo pre-installed on their Laptop range.UPDATE: QliLinux have informed us that they are now offering Gentoo Linux on all their systems, not just the laptops!
